column5: I think we will want to spend the night in Ft. Frances on our trip North. We are not pulling a boat. I pulled a list of Motels from the internet. Red Dog, Super 8, Rainy Lake Hotel, Kettlers Garden Resturant, Mid-Town, Makabi Inn, Rainbow and Baview. Any suggestions. Or places to stay away from? Ivy
The super 8 is nice and right on the road out of town.
[font color=green size=3][b]I'd second the Super 8, it's easy to find.
Try the Rendevoux(sorry if spelled wrong) real nice place to stay and the price is not bad. Nice bar good food.Nice scenery while sit back and have a couple of cold ones.
Red Dog is nice if you want a beer and food,,, super 8 is right next door so just as good... The dog is a little run down compared to super 8.

We have stayed here the last 10 years after staying at the red dog in once. Its called La Place Rendez-Voux, and the spelling is right off their business card. Toll free number is 1-800-544-9435. As was said its very nice, probably the nicest with a good view of the lake if you get a room on that side and good restaurant. Its on the edge of town going east. Its a good idea to get accross the border that night instead of trying the next morning.

Gentlemen, Thanks for the information. Making it across the border Friday night rather than Saturday morning makes a lot of sense. Should get to the border between 6 and 7 in the evening. Hopefully there won't be much of a wait at that time. Ivy
